name: @dyn/dtom
description: Design Tree Object Model (DTOM) render engine for dyn.art

scripts.build: shx rm -rf dist && pnpm run build:rust && pnpm run build:ts
scripts.build:rust: cd ./rust && wasm-pack build --target bundler --out-dir ../local_modules/dyn-dtom-wasm && cd .. && pnpm install ./local_modules/dyn-dtom-wasm
scripts.clean: shx rm -rf dist && shx rm -rf node_modules && shx rm -rf .turbo

author: @bennoinbeta
